text: Charles Wesley Robinson (September 7, 1919 - May 20, 2014) was an American entrepreneur. He served as United States Deputy Secretary of State from 1975 through 1976 under the Gerald Ford administration. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:Businesspeople from Los Angeles County, California Category:Politicians from Long Beach, California Category:United States Deputy Secretaries of State Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Charles W. Robinson
